title: Women with type 1 diabetes and women with type 2 diabetes differ in knowledge and beliefs about contraception and pregnancy
abstract: To assess differences in knowledge and beliefs about pregnancy in women with diabetes.

citations.title: Attendance at pre‐pregnancy care clinics for women with type 1 diabetes: A scoping review
